name: Bit & Byte
description:
A terrible malware infected Tommy’s computer and he cannot use it anymore. When everything seemed to be lost, here it comes: a help from a little hero. . . a bit. Our hero will have to travel to the heart of the pc: the kernel, fixing all the bugs, solving puzzles and defeating Viruses. Start with the high-level applications, and go on to the operative system to solve various problems. Free the imprisoned programs and use their unique skills to help you during your adventure.

This is a platformer puzzle game where the key to success is the cooperation between the characters. Video game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course

Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria
